message: This hallway is just as white as the first one, but narrower, and utterly without decoration.

name: ノイズ
message: "I gotta do something here."
Noiz closes his map and starts walking down the hall.
He keeps his eyes on the floor as he walks, like he's looking for something. Suddenly, he stops.

name: ノイズ
message: "This is it."
Noiz points at the wall with his chin, indicating a network panel.
Kneeling in front of it, he pulls a cord from his Coil and plugs it into the socket.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What're you doing?"

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm gonna hack this floor's network."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Why here?"

name: ノイズ
message: "This floor's off-limits. Security's just gonna get tighter from here, so I'm gonna plant a false signal here and freeze the whole floor."

name: ノイズ
message: "No matter what we do, from the outside, it'll look like nothing's wrong."

name: ノイズ
message: "It's not gonna last for long, but it should buy us some time."
Noiz opens his Coil's screen and gets to work.
His hands move with unbelievable speed, speed matched only by that of the text streaming down his display, but even then, it takes a fair bit of time.
I wait anxiously for him to finish. It's crazy to spend so much time camped out in enemy territory. No denying the kid has balls.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You done yet?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Almost."
Noiz answers without stopping.
Restless, I let my attention wander down the hall... and there, I notice something.
Is that...<?>
a dog?
It is. A dog with smooth, black fur, casually walking toward us.
Why is there a dog here? Is it someone's Allmate?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, Noiz!"

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm almost done."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No, there's..."
I trail off, realizing that I shouldn't distract him.
Instead, I open my bag to see what Ren thinks.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, what is that? Why is a dog here?"

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba, run. That machine―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Machine?"
The black dog stops...
And then its mouth opens wide, revealing a long metal tube.

name: 蓮
message: "That's a security Allmate. It's armed."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Armed?! Noiz, run!"
Noiz looks up, then starts to dodge to the side.
But before he can, a brilliant red light bursts from the dog's mouth.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look out!"
I tackle Noiz to the ground just in time.
What the hell was that?!
I glance over my shoulder. Where the beam struck, the wall is charred black.
My blood turns cold. What would've happened if that had hit one of us?

name: 蒼葉
message: "That was close... Ouch!"
I feel a sharp pain in my side when I try to get up. My shirt is torn, and my skin is burned.
The beam must've clipped me when I tackled Noiz.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Worry about that!"
I point frantically at the dog.
The metal tube is aimed straight at us. How soon can it fire again?

name: ノイズ
message: "Ngh!"
To my utter shock, Noiz charges at the monster.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Noiz!"
As I watch, he pulls a cube from his waist and thrusts it into the dog's mouth.
A moment later, clouds of smoke pour from the creature's maw.
Its front legs jerk and wobble, and then it collapses.
Did he just... clog the barrel with a cube and cause it to backfire?
That was completely insane. If he'd been a second too late...
...He never learns, does he? Still, there's no denying that he saved our asses.
